CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Using DCB as the processing solvent , four polymer solar cells with blends of PSFDTBT and PC71BM in weight ratios of 1 : 2.5 , 1 : 3 , 1 : 3.5 , and 1 : 4 , respectively , as the active layer were fabricated , and their J-V curves are shown in Figure 3a.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| DCB (DCB as the processing solvent) |
| PSFDTBT (blends of PSFDTBT) |
| PC71BM (blends of PC71BM)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| DCB (processing solvent) |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

However, since it is a material that plays a significant role in the fabrication of the solar cells, it is included in the table. If the focus is only on the material properties of the active layer, then "DCB" should be removed from the table.
